const request = require('./');
 
 
 
function doRequest(url, f) {
  const options = {
    url: url, // return a 500 status
    maxAttempts: 3,
    retryDelay: 100,
    retryStrategy: function myRetryStrategy(err, response, body) {
      console.log(options.url);
      // retry the request if we had an error or if the response was a 'Bad Gateway'
      return err || response.statusCode >= 500;
    }
  };
 
  request(options, function (err, response, body) {
    f(err, body);
  });
}
 
doRequest('http://127.0.0.1:2093', function(){});
doRequest('http://127.0.0.1:2091', function(){});
